original_text: Now the rest of the acts of Omri that he did, and the might that he showed, are they not written in the Book of the Chronicles of the Kings of Israel?
korean_text: 오므리가 행한 그 남은 사적과 그가 부린 권세는 이스라엘 왕 역대지략에 기록되지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: Now the rest of the acts of Omri that he did,
and the might that he showed,
in the Book of the Chronicles of the Kings of Israel?
